question: Who has been appointed as Australia's new ODI captain?
explanation: Tim Paine will lead the ODI side in the UK in the absence of banned former captain Steve Smith. Aaron Finch has been appointed as his one-day deputy captain for the five-match series. Aaron Finch will lead the T20 international team. Alex Carey has been appointed the vice-captain for a one-off T20 in England and a T20 tri-series in Zimbabwe. The appointment of Tim Paine as ODI captain is temporary. A long-term captain will be appointed later.
